動物用藥品名稱: 益獸雞新城病、傳染性鼻炎不活化混合疫苗
效能(適應症): 種雞和蛋雞：預防雞新城病及傳染性鼻炎之感染。
ingredients: INACTIVATED NEWCASTLE DISEASE VIRUS (strain La Sota)>=50PD50INACTIVATED CULTURES OF :HAEMOPHILUS PARAGALLINARUM SEROTYPE A5X10^9 CFUHAEMOPHILUS PARAGALLINARUM SEROTYPE B5X10^9 CFUHAEMOPHILUS PARAGALLINARUM SEROTYPE C5X10^9 CFUSORBITAN MONOCOLEATE 0.037ML         LIGHT MINERAL OIL  0.337MLTHIOMERSAL 50UG
